channel.title: How can i change the spawn point of characters?
channel.description: i want to change the spawn point to somewere else, may you tell me please how can i do it?? you know when you first log in, and when you die

item.title: How can i change the spawn point of characters?
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

Don’t add him, he’ll want a reward. Look in player.java and search for // initial x and y coordinates of the player

You shall see something like

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 3209; teleportToY = 3434;

Just change the coords to wherever.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change the spawn point of characters?
